intro: Calyptranthes eugeniopsoides, commonly known as the white-flowered calyptranthes, is a species of flowering plant in the family Myrtaceae. It is native to the tropical regions of South America, particularly Brazil. The plant is characterized by its small, white flowers that are typically clustered in inflorescences. Its leaves are generally elliptical and have a smooth texture. It is often found growing in shaded, humid environments within tropical forests.
